meaning_str.bing:
n. 小便；撒尿
v. 撒尿
网络. 尿尿；PLL Engaged External；小便的俚语说法

尿尿；PLL Engaged External；小便的俚语说法

（尤指儿童用语）撒尿；排尿；小便；尿尿

1.en: Every night I drink at least a pot of white water, but do not get out of bed at midnight pee.
1.cn: 我每天晚上至少喝一壶白水，但从不半夜下床撒尿。

2.en: you're going to be drinking pee soon. Recycled wastewater is coming to a tap near you--if it isn't there already.
2.cn: 再利用的污水很快就会成为你的自来水，而对有些人来说这已经是现实了。

3.en: John F. Kennedy: (turning to camera) I believe he said he had to go pee. Heh heh.
3.cn: （对着镜头）我相信他刚才说的是他想去撒尿，呵呵

1.en: Don't you have to pee? That's why I'm dancing.
1.cn: 你不想尿了？这就是我跳舞的原因。

2.en: There's a little pee coming out of me right now.

3.en: I got out to pee a couple times. Then I didn't get out to pee a couple times.
3.cn: 我中间出来撒过几次尿，也有几次没出来就在里面尿了。

4.en: Oh, is that really true? Owen. Look, do you want me to pee in a cup or something?
4.cn: 真的是这样吗？欧文。你们要我尿一杯给你们测测吗？

5.en: Well, you'd pee in Dad's shoes too if you didn't know what's going on. All right, call me back. Mothers.
5.cn: 如果你不知道，你也可以尿在爸爸的鞋子里，好吧，给我回电话。是妈妈。

6.en: That's right I stepped up. She's my friend and she needed help. And if I had too, I'd pee on anyone of you.
6.cn: 没错，我帮了她一个大忙，她是我的朋友，她需要帮忙，有必要的话，我会尿在你们身上。

7.en: Congratulations. How do you feel? I got to pee. I believe he said he had to pee.
7.cn: 祝贺你。你感觉如何？我想撒尿。我听着他好象说他想撒尿。

8.en: Didn't you have to pee? I held most of it in.
8.cn: 难道你都不用尿尿吗？我忍住了大部分。

9.en: Hey, we haven't been on a second date, she needs to hear me pee?
9.cn: 我们还没第二次约会，她需要听到我尿尿的声音吗？

10.en: I can't believe we're at a real college party. I have to pee so bad.
10.cn: 难以置信我们在一个真的大学聚会上。我兴奋的直想尿尿。

11.en: Yesterday at my audition, I really had to pee. Apparently, having a pee makes me a really good actor. I got a callback, so I'm drinking everything. Oh, by the way that eggnog in our fridge was great!
11.cn: 昨天在试演的时候我好想尿尿，很明显地，那让我演的很棒。可以参加最后试演，所以我要喝多一点东西，对了，我们冰箱里面的蛋奶实在太好喝了。

12.en: What's this? That's a dog, every house should have a dog. Not one that can pee on the roof.
12.cn: 这是什么？狗狗，每栋房子都应该有狗，不能大到可以在屋顶上撒尿。

13.en: Does he let you know when he needs to pee? That's why I wouldn't do that. Oh, I get it now.
13.cn: 它要尿尿的时候会告诉你吗？所以我才不会把它放床上。哦 我明白了。

14.en: I don't know about all that, but this one is one that I heard. I heard he doesn't pee or poop.
14.cn: 我对此一无所知，但是我仅仅听到过的一点，听说金将军不尿尿也不拉粑粑。

15.en: That's right. That's right. Saran Wrap on the toilet seat so the pee goes everywhere. Oh that.
15.cn: 对，是的，马桶座上包了保鲜膜，于是尿尿时喷得到处都是。哦，那个啊。

16.en: Oh, come on, Joey. We care about you. We're worried about you. And some of us really have to pee.
16.cn: 别这样了，乔伊，我们关心你。我们很关心你。我们有些人真的很急要尿尿。

17.en: Oh. Well, he waited in line for 14 hours, while you napped in a lawn chair, he got in a fight with a Klingon when he stepped out of line to pee and you wouldn't wake up to vouch for him, and worst of all, he saw Star Trek: Nemesis.
17.cn: 哦，他排了14个小时的队，而你却在躺椅上睡大觉，他在离队去尿尿的时候和一个克林贡人吵了起来，而你却不愿起来证明他没有插队，最恶劣的是，他还看了《星际迷航:复仇女神》。

18.en: Well. I'm just kidding. You can go pee.
18.cn: 喔…我只是在开玩笑，你可以去上厕所了。

19.en: You're telling me my man doesn't pee or poop?
19.cn: 你是说他既不嘘嘘也不拉屎？
